message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $180. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal!
Hi Alice,  $180 is a bit steep for me.  I'm really interested in this product, but my budget is closer to $120.  Would you be willing to come down to $130?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $180 represents the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $160. This is a very fair offer.
Alice, I'm really interested in this product, but $160 is still a little higher than I'm comfortable paying. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $140?
